mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POPUP (POP_CD, POP_TTL, POP_FNM, POP_ST, POP_ET, POP_YN) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(POP_CD), 0) + 1 FROM POPUP), #{popTtl}, #{popFnm}, #{popSt}, #{popEt}, #{popYn} )
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY POP_CD ASC) RNUM, POP_CD, POP_TTL, POP_FNM, POP_FPT, POP_ST, POP_ET, POP_YN FROM POPUP ORDER BY RNUM DESC
SELECT POP_CD, POP_TTL, POP_FNM, POP_FPT, POP_ST, POP_ET, POP_YN FROM POPUP WHERE POP_CD = #{popCd}

SELECT POP_CD, POP_TTL, POP_FNM, POP_FPT, POP_ST, POP_ET, POP_YN FROM POPUP WHERE POP_YN = 1
AND SYSDATE >= POP_ST AND SYSDATE <= POP_ET
